scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.server: cd backend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation nodemon server.js
scripts.client: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation npm start
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
